com.solacesystems.jms

Interface SolEventSource

  • Deprecated. 
    SolConsumerEventSource largely implements the same concepts provided by this class. It makes use of SolConsumerEventListener which replaced SolEventListener.

    public interface SolEventSource
    This is an interface for a SolEvent source. A SolEvent source allows adding and removing listeners for SolEvent.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long SOLEVENT_MASK_ALL
      Deprecated. 
      This mask will accept all event types

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      Registers a SolEventListener to receive all possible event types specified in com.solacesystems.jms.SolEvent.
      void addSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener, long eventTypeMask)
      Deprecated. 
      Registers a SolEventListener to receive events of types specified in eventTypeMask (possible types are defined in com.solacesystems.jms.SolEvent).
      void removeSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      Removes the previously added SolEventListner for all possible event types.
      void removeSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener, long eventTypeMask)
      Deprecated. 
      Removes the previously added SolEventListner for the given eventTypeMask.

    • Field Detail

      • SOLEVENT_MASK_ALL

        static final long SOLEVENT_MASK_ALL
        Deprecated. 
        This mask will accept all event types
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addSolEventListener

        void addSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener,
                         long eventTypeMask)
                  throws javax.jms.JMSException
        Deprecated. 
        Registers a SolEventListener to receive events of types specified in eventTypeMask (possible types are defined in com.solacesystems.jms.SolEvent). A SolEventListener can be added more than once. If the application adds the same SolEventListener with a different eventTypeMask, the net effect is cumulative. Using the same eventTypeMask has no effect. To de-register or remove the SolEventListner instance, call removeSolEventListner() If the SolEventSource does not emit an event type specified in the eventTypeMask then a com.solacesystems.jms.ConfigurationException is thrown
        Parameters:
        listener - parameter
        eventTypeMask - parameter
        Throws:
        javax.jms.JMSException - on error

      • addSolEventListener

        void addSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener)
                  throws javax.jms.JMSException
        Deprecated. 
        Registers a SolEventListener to receive all possible event types specified in com.solacesystems.jms.SolEvent. specified in eventTypeMask (possible types are defined in com.solacesystems.jms.SolEvent).
        Parameters:
        listener - parameter
        Throws:
        javax.jms.JMSException - on error

      • removeSolEventListener

        void removeSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the previously added SolEventListner for all possible event types. It is ok to call this method even if the listener instance was already removed or was not added in the first place
        Parameters:
        listener - parameter

      • removeSolEventListener

        void removeSolEventListener(SolEventListener listener,
                            long eventTypeMask)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the previously added SolEventListner for the given eventTypeMask. It is ok to call this method even if the listener instance was already removed or was not added in the first place
        Parameters:
        listener - parameter
        eventTypeMask - parameter
